body:
Comment 2: 
The na√Øve fix does not work.

diff -r 4ab152b54171 src/cmd/8g/cgen.c
--- a/src/cmd/8g/cgen.c	Mon Feb 24 22:31:01 2014 -0500
+++ b/src/cmd/8g/cgen.c	Tue Feb 25 08:50:20 2014 +0100
@@ -920,6 +920,9 @@
 	if(n == N)
 		n = nodbool(1);
 
+	while(n->op == OCONVNOP)
+		n = n->left;
+
 	if(n->ninit != nil)
 		genlist(n->ninit);
 

gives me:

$ GOARCH=386 /opt/remy/go/pkg/tool/linux_amd64/8g -pack ./control.go ./control_linux.go
./dgramopt_posix.go ./doc.go ./endpoint.go ./genericopt_posix.go ./header.go ./helper.go
./helper_posix.go ./helper_unix.go ./iana.go ./icmp.go ./packet.go ./payload.go
./sockopt_linux.go ./sockopt_unix.go
./control.go:1: internal compiler error: temp used and not set: 17183
(./control.go:1)	MOVL	"".autotmp_1264+0(SP),BX

I wonder if there is a hidden second bug.
